altername_name: Visiteurs, Les - La Relique de Sainte Rolande
name: Les Visiteurs: La Relique de Sainte Rolande
overview: In Les Visiteurs La Relique de Sainte Rolande It embodies in turn Godefroy de Papincourt (Comte de Montmirail) and Jacquouille la Fripouille attempting to address the actions of the witch of Malcomb. Wicked lady has indeed used the corridors of time to hide the relic of St. Rolande in the 20th century. This relic is supposed to bring fertility to the marriage of Godefroy and Frénégonde de Pouille. The witch also reported objects of the 20th century and dispersed in the 12th when creating a curse on the family of Montmiraille. The scenario is not from one of the two films even if it inspires widely. Each other Godefroy and Jacquouille must restore order in all this mess. Godefroy attends the 12th century, he wanders through the maze of a castle horrible and should eliminate the few monsters that stand in his way while solving small puzzles (make a soup, put shields in a certain order .. .). Jacquouille is for his part in a commercial center of the 20th century. His first task is to find the precious relic while avoiding the guards who, it is not clear why the beat when they see it. Both characters can retrieve objects that restoring the energy: ham, bananas and even bottles of wine (or vinasse, as stated in the game). The game divided into 6 levels.
